text: is a town located in Kamikawa Subprefecture, Hokkaido, Japan. As of September 2016, the town has an estimated population of 11,053 and a density of 47 persons per km². The total area is 237.18 km². ==Sister city== The town of Kamifurano has a sister city named Camrose in Alberta, Canada. Kamifurano, Hokkaido, Japan ==External links== * *Official Website Category:Towns in Hokkaido
title: Kamifurano, Hokkaido
